body_html:
@marcgreenstock are you working on the last item, the mentor signoff?

#188 has a skipped example that's a placeholder for the mentor ping (some email with a link, stating that they can now sign off that application).

Technically, the sign off isn't a thing on the draft anymore as it's already converted to an application. The controller action may very well be PUT applications#signoff. Or we can signoff on the drafts controller, proxying the signoff to the has_one - associated application record. The latter doesn't feel right in a RESTful sense, but would have the charm of re-using the index template and just add a button to the application drafts listing.
